title: #5【バイオハザードre4】はじめてのバイオハザードre4やるにぇえええええええ！！！※未成年視聴注意【ホロライブ/さくらみこ】
name: Sakura Miko

entries.text: It's been a whole day since I saw you all.
tonight I'm going to play more Biohazard RE:4, heading towards the new release.
I think you all remember, since it was just yesterday,
but I plan to play while keeping those button reflexes in mind today too.
The Treasure Hunter impression is strong.
Well, Miko-chan does Treasure Hunting for a living,
Looking at Mico-Leon up until last time...
Oh, right. The person who did the, um, the cosplay of Ashley... the person who actually, um, cosplayed Miko-chan's [version]... I found them on X. They were seriously beautiful, I was surprised.
The person used for the body...
That means it's no exaggeration to say
I'm going to be appearing in it.
there's going to be an event.
I don't know if it's just where we cut off,
but Ashley disappears from Miko-chan's side every time.
We fell into the abyss, right? The abyss.
Fell into the abyss... "What is this hellish place?"
We were wandering around like that,
and finally managed to meet up with Luis.
Like, what on earth was Luis doing?
Miko thinks, "Didn't you say we'd meet in the courtyard?"
Well, we met up and that's where we ended last time.
Let's watch the summary up to that point.
Ashley suddenly turned a blade on Leon.
She left for the depths of the castle with unsteady steps, like a puppet.
Last time, Ada was the best.
"If you won't give up easily... I guess we're doing this."
He punched us before the conversation even finished! Ah, Giganoto is here! When it was Giganoto...
I wonder if I can do it.
I'm totally gonna fall for Leon.
Ashley's face just says "I love Leon."
Hah! Even if I'm scared, I won't run!
Step forward! Once you step out, it's scary. It's fine to be scared. But don't run.
Right, this, this! Isn't this the strongest item? Leon wants it too. It's okay, Mico. Once we take this, let's grab the lamp immediately.
Alright, she got taken away again.
That's the Saddler mark. Saddler's mark.
"I, Isidro Uriarte Talavera, vow here. I will transcend humanity and become a true servant of God."
"I will be captured by the hunt and become its executioner, Verdugo."
I'm desperate just reading the kanji.
But apparently defeating it is a big deal.
"A friend?" Wait, who and who? He's actually quite human.
Now that I try eating it... Was this from someone's perspective the whole time?
"I owe you one, Luis." "Yeah, you do."
Okay! So, we defeated Isidro-kun and... Luis...
...we beat up Luis? No, that's not what happened.
I was spinning around so much.
I spun around so much, things got crazy.
Ah, beat up Luis... Ah, did I say "beat up Luis"?
So, this Right is the right side.
Let's get started. Tonight as well.
Huh? Did the sound cut out?
Like this. Okay, let's do this.
"Dropped into the depths of Ramon's castle..."
Eh, did you remove it already?
It looks like a ballpoint pen.
You didn't come to the courtyard!
Do you realize that? Come on!
Eh, there's some kind of reference.
I know what a mountain summit is, but...
Wait, the Merchant guy is here.
There's a shooting range? Foreman's Record. "Oct 11. Today is the worst day of my life."
"To think I'd spend my beloved daughter's 5th birthday on a ship heading to this gloomy island."
"If the pay wasn't good, who would work in a place like this? The castle folks treat the excavation goods carefully but treat us like ants."
"I inhaled some dust during work due to a mistake."
"They wouldn't even tell me what it was properly."
"I'm coughing a bit. I'll just go to sleep."
"I coughed up blood three times just today."
"I was an idiot for being lured by easy money."
"My beloved family, forgive your pathetic father."
"Since this morning, my head isn't working."
"Why? I threw up lots of blood."
The person before they turned into a bug.
There was the thing about drinking the water, but...
Did he drink the dust? The water...
He inhaled the dust, then drank water to fix it, and somehow...
I didn't know about the dust.
My partner is fine like this.
These are the ones Isidro was wearing.
I don't need these bolts either.
What should I do? Should I level up?
"Don't underestimate the moment that divides life and death."
"Modifying your favorite weapon to your liking."
Hey, Luis, don't you have any money?
Sharing ammo and stuff is important!
This really is a shooting range, right?
Wait a minute. Isn't this too soon? Isn't the frequency too high?
Let's do this. Together. Can't be helped. Just gotta do it.
The Red9. The one I use. Watch this, Luis.
"I'm expecting big things." I see. Fast.
This... aren't you amazed by this gun handling?
Triple kill just now, were you watching?
Eh, this isn't a rifle, is it?
Eh, this is a handgun, right?
Why are you making a smug face?
Is this guy making a smug face?
You were totally making a smug face just now.
Wait, do Silver Tokens not give good stuff?
And here is no good, so here.
Nice! This guy looks like he's about to be fired.
Ammo... I have a bit too much handgun ammo.
The feeling of ammo replenishment is good.
Well, he feels like he did something wrong. So essentially, the Plaga is partially your fault? Is that it?
And he's trying to make up for it. Well, he's not a bad person.
I don't dislike him. Even if he did bad things.
"Notice regarding change in explosive storage location." "Changing storage location for paintings/goods." "Excavation Dynamite."
Oi, oi, it's a dead end.
It looks like a Go board.
Scared me! There's a lot of them!
Whoa, there's quite a few. It's okay, Luis.
Leave it to me. I'll deal with them here first. That is...
You're fine! You're fine! You didn't see that, right?
This is a good scene for Chan! Payback for the smug face!
So? Ah, we go from here?
Stop the "Amen," Luis! I just saw that for the first time.
You were saying "Amen." You're a good guy properly.
Is it because you did this? Did you do the Plaga thing?
Miko's theory might be correct here. Now then.
But hey, having Luis here makes fighting easier.
Sorry to Ashley, but yeah... amazing.
This is a handshake event, everyone! It's chaotic! Shaking hands with Mico-Leon is always risking your life, everyone!
Does this not open? Up then?
Nothing? There's a lot of stuff.
Did I forget to pick something up? Opening it!
Ah, this way. I forgot to pick it up.
I used up the shotgun ammo.
Ah, so I open this here.
Ah, so I can go up here now.
Whoa, so many, so many, so many, so many!
In the way of my mission!
What, does it have that much power?!
Saying "Ah~" and "Ah~", you look like an idiot, Mico-Leon!
I was innocently happy, then got blown up.
So I just need to get away.
Wait, I haven't done the Treasure Hunt!
Why did it advance a bit?
Let's do it brilliantly, coolly, strongest-ly.
Eh, so what was this Number 5 thing?
You open a hole like this...
And stick the dynamite in here?
You don't get it, Luis. You don't get it, do you?
I see. So that's how they used it.
The path connected, but is this the halfway point?
I feel like Rifle Ammo is better...
His eyes are open a bit.
I wonder how many people have been eaten by these guys.
What's this? What should I do?
I have 10 now, but plenty of healing.
Open that and drop it... Eh?
I could have dropped him with that machine!
I wanted to see the Magma Dive too, Luis.
But Luis's TNT plan was good.
As long as we beat them.
Can't we have Luis do that part?
Why am I always the base?
We're about the same height though.
Wrapped in amber... but wait, they were birthing from a mother body?
Ah, but they researched that to figure out how to make them, and brought back the Plaga?
Ah, but Plaga and insects are different.
So Plaga was an ancient creature to begin with.
I wonder if he's mentally okay.
Like, if you drink ancient water or something, your body has a massive adverse reaction. That happens, right?
Like, "I drank this super clean water but..."
Undiscovered... not pathogens, but what is it? Bacteria?
Like microorganisms entering your body... ancient ones... that happens.
And then you get a huge fever.
What kind of knowledge is that?
I saw it in a video somewhere.
What is this? It's like a roller coaster!
Nobody can jump with that reaction speed, Luis!
But it was kind of fun.
Like a roller coaster, or an attraction.
Did he get me with a knife from behind?
It was a super friendly trolley ride, really.
Looks like we can go this way too.
A weird amount of items... hm?
"Endlessly spawning bugs killed many of our comrades."
"Destroy the bug entrances in the giant hive..."
But they give lots of items.
I can do a puppy [parry?] on every special move.
I'm doing it like a total pro.
Can't tell if covered in dust or camouflaged.
Hah! "Fun time is starting." "Still doing this here?"
"We have unique items." "You chased us all the way here?" "It's treasure."
"Thank you." "In a good way, of course."
Thank you. Wait, is it time to sell treasure?
This makes it purple. Purple butterfly.
I'll just sell the Flagon for now.
Five Color Crown is 100k, I think.
Or rather, let's meet again. Merchant Ojisan.
Took a long way around, seriously.
We came up? "Fresh air is calling us."
"We've made it this far, practically there. Just one more push."
I can only make Rifle Ammo right now!
"Thought you were dead... Traitor?" "Never gonna be forgiven."
"The op... but that's no reason to keep doing it." "No use."
"Up to here, Rookie." "Haven't changed a bit since then."
Luis! "Ladies all over the world will grieve."
I couldn't focus on listening much...
It was a conversation like that.
So he's Leon's master? Knife skills wise?
Luis was a character destined to die, but it's sad.
Luis lent a hand, helped with the research, right?
That's why the villagers became victims...
He came back to this island for atonement.
So even though he acted like a joker...
In the end, he came to settle things because he wanted to change.
While Luis was running away, he probably had conflicts...
But coming here meant he wanted to change.
It wasn't a noble deed, what he did...
But settling the score... Don Quixote.
I don't get the Don Quixote reference, but...
I think it was a noble death.
Ah, sneeze didn't come out. Sorry.
Eh, but I thought of one thing.
She put it in, but this...
That guy earlier had it here too...
I think it's dangerous storing a knife there though.
Does that mean they trained this part together too?
Eh, so I'm going to kill my boss?
"Throwing something at it might be good."
"Retrieve the jewel stolen by a crow."
"Seems it took it back to its nest."
"If you chase the crow, you should find the nest."
"Don't want it to be a bird's toy."
"Movement speed is the most praiseworthy part."
Gold tokens, I still have some.
I want to do Token Gacha.
But won't I use them against him?
I see, this might be an option.
Don't rub it again. It's full. Heave-ho.
Lies too... one... Okay, let's say goodbye here...
and go? I can really go to the Shooting Range via this elevator.
You smell like you're running away.
Is it possible there are multiple of you?
I don't craft Magnum ammo though.
Gold Token exchange count is unlimited.
I said I don't need bolts!
Why are you directing so much?
Wait? If I saved and did that...
Could I have done it infinitely?
"Displayed in the room, do something to deface the portrait."
Where is the portrait? "You're the last one." Okay, okay.
Room of White Insects... Here. Gimmick. Treasure Hunt here.
After going to the courtyard. Something in the courtyard?
Crow's Nest? Where is the Nest?
Where is the Crow's Nest? Vanished instantly.
Apologize to the crow. The crow stole it.
Still not enough! Still not enough.
"Extra, you're a real pro. What's your desire?"
Now I just go to the Lord's Room, right?
Because I want a good one.
Don't you think? Isn't it frustrating? Only getting Commons. That's weird. Even with Gold Tokens.
You want to win a good one, right?
Can't accept putting in gold and getting nothing.
But it's fine, I put in 2 Silvers, so something good will come.
Should I make them all Gold?
If I do it, I can get it.
I have no interest in you guys.
Wait, have I been here before?
Ah right, I was dropped here.
"My sublime quest finally moves to the final stage."
"The Butler volunteered for the experiment himself."
"To transcend humanity and serve Lord Ramon even more."
"I shall answer that deep loyalty with a precedent."
So that person being experimented on...
"3 is the most beautiful and perfect number."
Isn't it because it was March?
"Supports Lord Ramon as his right arm."
There were lots in the garden.
"Finally I shall transcend the human frame..."
"With this, forever sharing destiny with you..."
Hiding in a place like this...
"The first head called the holy teachings..."
"Not only that, they stole the treasure of Los Iluminados and sealed it under this castle."
Ah, they sealed the Plaga underground.
"How many times have I been ashamed of the cowardly blood flowing in me."
"Finally, the day of celebration has come."
"I return the Holy Body Plaga sealed under the castle."
So you're the one who woke it up.
"By the grace of the Holy Body, the sinners shall be reborn as God's livestock, Ganados."
So those controlled by Plaga are called Ganados.
"In other words, your livestock." Ganados are livestock.
How can they offer loyalty so easily?
Now is not the time for this.
Since it says Salazar, it must be this guy.
If anything happens to Ashley, I won't forgive you.
You know, the thing that lures them with sound.
I was totally going to punch them...
I'm just luring them to me!
I was getting roasted the whole time.
I was doing it super seriously.
I was playing seriously to death, but...
"Even a corpse finds that a stretch."
He thinks Mico-Leon is an idiot.
What do I use the Golden Egg for, everyone?
Hey, you're acting like you're on that side now.
Acting like "Oh, you joined that side too?"
So, we can be together forever, Sancho.
Wait, can I go to the toilet for a sec?
Now we're together forever! Look everyone! Together forever! Luis!
Ah, I want Flash Grenades though.
This is the Clock place! Pretty close!
Building all these facilities to get places... must be hard to live here.
Gold bar, gold bar. Only gold bars.
How much stash are you hiding?
Let's throw an egg at him.
Hearing voices from everywhere, can't tell.
But smells like lots of items.
Just gotta go up for now.
Going for the Two Color Bonus.
The thing to get is right there but...
Really in front of the clock!
So there's a lot of them there.
This is the one mentioned earlier.
Leon's death collection is growing again.
I have an outrageous item here too.
Doesn't this mean I can buy the Rocket Launcher?
I can buy the Rocket Launcher, right?
Don't need it? Don't need it?
Then upgrade weapons, and if there's leftovers...
Which is better? Riot Gun or Rifle?
Rifle kills in one or two shots usually.
Next time I save money, definitely buying Rocket Launcher.
Because the Merchant Ojisan said so.
Since the Merchant Ojisan who helps us so much says so...
Healing items are plentiful. I have the Golden Egg too.
Well, hold off on this for now?
Miko-chan's aim might even be better.
"How is it? As promised, I have handed over the girl."
"Please do not forget this Ramon's loyalty to the Lord."
Aim is good even when silent.
Didn't think you'd do something so merciless.
Can safely avoid spray by hiding.
We don't have time for this!
Gonna fight him later anyway, right?
If I have parts I can craft.
You're trying to distance yourself from Krauser.
"To correct your son Ramon's twisted personality..."
"I could not fulfill your final wish."
"I first saw a glimpse of that evil when Ramon was still a child."
"Ramon called a gardener he secretly nicknamed 'Purgatory' to his room."
"And poured it on the kneeling man's face."
"Young Ramon watching the skin burn and the man writhe in pain..."
"He lost his parents and closed his heart."
"Unleashing the Plaga sealed by generations of Salazars..."
"Even accepting it into his own body..."
That's why he was so loyal.
"That is the duty of the Butler..."
Miko-chan will become smart this year.
Breakable boxes without meaning? Shall we leave the island?
Where to? Is there Black Bass?
Damn. Don't know what we're looking for.
Always supporting us. With keys and all.
Shall we go out to sea together? Exciting.
"I have questions, but will you answer honestly?"
"The world changed. For every one saved, a hundred die."
"Just telling yourself that." Why do you know me? What's over there?
"Then I ask. How about you, Ada?"
"I like that part of you. See ya."
Coming? Cry? "Cry!" I knew he'd say it.
"I'm gonna cry." Feels like I'm being played in the palm of her hand.
What is it? Leon tries hard...
Acting like a Phantom Thief, acting high and mighty, but in the end...
"He's rolled by Ada." That part is good.
Who? Being carried here. Like enemies.
Isn't it wide? What is this, everyone? Gotta hurry.
Can't see at all. Can't see.
Anyone? Not enough ammo. What's this?
Eh? What's this? Can't hit this, right?
"The wicked drive us with weapons." "Grass and trees wither."
"Isolated island like purgatory." "Renouncer, kill." "Until the time comes."
You were in a place like this...
Means I should size up, everyone.
I haven't used Magnum at all yet.
Did his lips have that much value?
"Right? What do you desire? Nice trip."
Wait, Magnum ammo... didn't Miko-chan put it in?
Only one shot... Ammo can't be stored? Should have sold after using.
Oh, gotta operate something. Tough. Alright.
Bad, feeling like things are changing. Getting ammo.
Can I change the direction of the top one?
Where do I go from here?
Can't go here? Climb it! Leon could.
Can climb, right? Why move it?
Really nothing? Looks like there is.
Bad bad bad bad bad bad bad.
Before getting fired, do the job.
Have to give a present. Drive? Where is Rocket Launcher?
Okay right? Rocket Launcher gone? Nice. Give me a break. Ammo.
Items... Not enough... very very not enough.
Okay dead. Safe. Rocket Launcher dead.
How many times? How many times?
New? Ominous pot... wait, no. Looked purple.
This locker opens. This one doesn't.
"Creating new human with immortal body and multiple hearts."
Switch like this... what is this place.
Letting me pick up so much?
"Destroyed lab, escaped. 20 hours to contain. 7 dead, 19 injured. One body and tool still inside subject."
Rest. Should have asked for more.
Hey. Good stopping point. End here?
What will happen. But today Luis...
Came back smaller. Worried about Mico-Leon.
Have to remove? Lab must exist.
Got key, go to Luis's lab, remove Plaga. Next time?
Otherwise body limit. Ammo limit too.
Lots of happenings today. Like this...
Why such sad events for Miko-chan?
Miko's Super Play will catch up instantly.
